PhIIdesign 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Dataset with design settings for sargent2stage

data_sargent2.Rd

Dataset as displayed in the following paper: Sargent DJ, Goldberg RM. A Three-Outcome Design for Phase II Clinical Trials. Controlled Clinical Trials 22:117-125

Examples

data(data_sargent2)
str(data_sargent2)
